ActFirst Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act
PrecisReappointment of CHARLOTTE MEARNS of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a director of the board of directors of the First Nations Statistical Institute to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective August 1, 2008.
